description:
Join us at **Newtown Park Brewing Co** in Bristol this month for an in-person South West Ruby meetup featuring
🍺 great beer (sponsored by Cookpad)
💬 talks by **Gavin Morrice** and **Michael McKelvaney**
☀️ sunshine (maybe)

Schedule

18:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, have a chat
19:00 - **"Even Fuller Stack Ruby" by Michael McKelvaney** \- another chance to delve into the fun and varied ways Michael has used ruby\, from photo booths to brew kits
19:30 - **"Domain Driven Development in Rails" by [Gavin Morrice](https://twitter.com/morricegavin)** \- a pragmatic introduction to applying [DDD principles](https://martinfowler.com/bliki/DomainDrivenDesign.html) to new and existing Rails projects
20:15 - More mingling

Slack

If you like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel
title: South West Ruby #38 In Person
